hackathon-description-text: HHBrown is a large shoe company that has been in business since 1883. We are owned by Berkshire Hathaway and specialize in Women's and Men's casual shoes but have brands in almost every shoe category from Work Boots to High Fashion.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: VP/GM - HHBrown shoe company - Vision Retailing
Senior Manager for Big Data and Technology Initiatives - Mass Technology Collaborative

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Free Pair of shoes for each team member

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1 Broadway, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, MA 02142, USA
hackathon-location-address: 1 Broadway, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, MA 02142, USA
hackathon-description-header: HH Brown Shoe Hack - It's about time someone hacked shoes...
